title: Miley Cyrus broke up with Kaitlynn Carter 'because their relationship was moving too fast'
text:
Miley Cyrus reportedly broke up with with Kaitlynn Carter as their two-month relationship was moving too fast.

According to TMZ, the musician, 26, wasn't ready to commit to a relationship with the Hills star, 32, just weeks after she announced her divorce from husband of eight months, actor Liam Hemsworth, 29.

Despite the recent claims, the Wrecking Ball singer has already embarked on a budding romance with fellow singer Cody Simpson, 22, as the pair were pictured kissing during a breakfast date earlier this week.

Split: Miley Cyrus reportedly broke up with with Kaitlynn Carter as their two-month relationship was moving too fast (pictured last month)

On the breakdown of her relationship with Kaitlynn, a source told TMZ: 'There was no cheating or fighting involved in Miley's decision to break things off after a 2-month whirlwind romance.'

The insider added that the pair 'got along like a house on fire', and even discussed the prospect of marriage.

Hannah Montana star Miley and TV personality Kaitlynn - who was married to Brody Jenner from June 2018 until their separation in July this year - are said to be on good terms, but the blogger is reportedly concerned over Miley's well-being.

MailOnline has contacted Miley and Kaitlynn's representatives for further comment.

Close: Despite the recent claims, the Wrecking Ball singer has already embarked on a budding romance with fellow singer Cody Simpson, 22

Exes: The musician, 26, wasn't ready to commit to a relationship with the Hills star, 32, just weeks after she announced her divorce from Liam Hemsworth, 29 (pictured in 2012)

The Tennessee native recently blasted 'slut-shamers' in a lengthy, passionate statement after receiving backlash following her recent kiss with singer Cody.

Social media sensation Miley took to Instagram to stick up for herself after putting an amorous display with singer Cody - who previously dated Gigi Hadid.

The singer first began her post by showing some love for Cody on her platform, in which she included a topless snap of him.

She added a gushing checklist, listing out the hunk's credentials: his age, Australian nationality (which she mentioned is 'my type'), and his 'abs'.

Amicable: On the breakdown of her relationship with Kaitlynn, a source told TMZ : 'There was no cheating or fighting involved in Miley's decision to break things off'

Former partner: Kaitlynn was married to Brody Jenner from June 2018 until their separation in July this year

Worry: Hannah Montana star Miley and the TV personality Kaitlynn are said to be on good terms, but the blogger is reportedly concerned over Miley's well-being (pictured last month)

The passionate statement read: 'I know the public feels invested in my past relationship [with ex Liam] because they felt like they saw it thru from the beginning,' the star began her longer confessional.

'I think that's why people have always felt so entitled over my life and how I live it because they've watched me grow up.'

'But I am grown now,' Miley continued, 'and make choices as an adult knowing the truth/details/reality.' People only "know" what they see on the internet.' [sic]

Miley also addressed the inequity of how famous women are portrayed in their pursuit of love and intimacy, as compared to famous men.

'Hot Girl Fall': The Tennessee native recently blasted 'slut-shamers' in a lengthy, passionate statement after receiving backlash following her recent kiss with singer Cody

She explained: 'Men (especially successful ones) are RARELY slut shamed. They move on from one beautiful woman to the next MOST times without consequence. They are referred to as "legends", "heart throbs" where women are called sluts/whores! I am trying to just THRIVE/survive in a "mans" world.'

'If we can't beat em, join em!' Miley concluded the section. 'If our president can "grab em by the p***y..." can't I just have a kiss and acai bowl?!?!'

After specifically responding to being recently spotted kissing Cody, she addressed their budding relationship in a separate story.

'I refuse to recluse and "date" from home cause A. That's not fun B. Extremely uncomfortable/puts me in a vulnerable position,' the Slide Away performer expressed.

Powerful: Social media sensation Miley took to Instagram to stick up for herself after putting an amorous display with singer Cody - who previously dated Gigi Hadid

'I would like to share an activity with someone I am dating and not be stuck at home with pretty much nothing to do but "Netflix and chill".

'This "dating" thing is new to me too. I've never been an "adult"/grown a** woman experiencing this... I was in a committed relationship for almost All my teens and early 20s; with the exception of a few breaks, which usually in those times I was working my a** off with not much R&R... and "meeting/trusting" people in my position is really tuff.'

'Don't f***ing pity me, not what I'm asking for,' Miley concluded. 'I have a great life I wouldn't trade for "privacy" but PLEASE don't make this awkward for me! I am trying to make light and like always MAKE FUN of myself/and the public's perception of me! Get used to me dating – this is where I am at!'
description: According to TMZ, the musician, 26, wasn't ready to commit to a relationship with the Hills star, 32, just weeks after she announced her divorce from husband of eight months, actor Liam, 29.
